class_notes: This course is intended to give students an understanding of the corporate finance analytic work conducted by major investment banks and boutique advisory firms. Areas reviewed will include business forecasting techniques, valuation analysis, cost of capital estimation, financial ratio benchmarking, and debt capacity & credit analysis. At the conclusion of the course, students will have developed stronger corporate finance analytic skills, insight regarding the drivers of company value, and improved judgement on some of the special technical challenges that often confront bankers and financial advisors.
